argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | catccatid.c | |- C = ( CatCat ` U ) |
| 2 |  | catccatid.b | |- B = ( Base ` C ) |
| 3 |  | catcid.o | |- .1. = ( Id ` C ) |
| 4 |  | catcid.i | |- I = ( idFunc ` X ) |
| 5 |  | catcid.u | |- ( ph -> U e. V ) |
| 6 |  | catcid.x | |- ( ph -> X e. B ) |
| 7 | 1, 2 | #P_catccatid | |- ( U e. V -> ( C e. Cat /\ ( Id ` C ) = ( x e. B |-> ( idFunc ` x ) ) ) ) |
| 8 | 5, 7 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( C e. Cat /\ ( Id ` C ) = ( x e. B |-> ( idFunc ` x ) ) ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_simprd | |- ( ph -> ( Id ` C ) = ( x e. B |-> ( idFunc ` x ) ) ) |
| 10 | 3, 9 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( ph -> .1. = ( x e. B |-> ( idFunc ` x ) ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( ph /\ x = X ) -> x = X ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( ph /\ x = X ) -> ( idFunc ` x ) = ( idFunc ` X ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( idFunc ` X ) e. _V |
| 14 | 13 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> ( idFunc ` X ) e. _V ) |
| 15 | 10, 12, 6, 14 | #P_fvmptd | |- ( ph -> ( .1. ` X ) = ( idFunc ` X ) ) |
| 16 | 15, 4 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( ph -> ( .1. ` X ) = I ) |
